alert.note: Alert for Butler (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 09 at 3:21AM CDT until August 09 at 4:15AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wichita has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Butler County in south central Kansas... * Until 415 AM CDT. * At 321 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles northeast of Rose Hill, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Dime to Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Andover, Augusta, Rose Hill, Douglass, Towanda, Benton, Leon, Latham, El Dorado Airport, Santa Fe Lake, Augusta Municipal Airport, and Beaumont. This includes Interstate 35 between Mile Markers 55 and 67. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
